<style>
body {
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

/* Top Profile Section - Light Gray */
.cover {
  background-color: #D3D3D3; /* light gray */
  text-align: center;
  padding: 60px 20px;
}

/* Profile Photo */
.profile-photo {
  width: 180px;
  height: 180px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  object-fit: cover;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  border: 4px solid #ffffff; /* white border around photo */
}

.cover h1 {
  font-size: 38px;
  margin: 10px 0;
  color: #000;
}

.cover p {
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  color: #000;
}

/* Top Button (Resume) */
.cover .resume-button {
  display: inline-block;
  margin-top: 10px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background-color: #0077b6; /* navy blue */
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Left-aligned sections - Navy Blue background, White text */
.main-content {
  max-width: 700px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  line-height: 1.6;
  padding: 40px 20px;
  color: #ffffff;
  background-color: #001f3f; /* navy blue */
  border-radius: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/* Section Headings */
.main-content h2 {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  font-size: 22px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #ffffff;
  padding-bottom: 5px;
  color: #ffffff;
}

/* Bottom Contact Button */
.contact-button-bottom {
  display: block;
  width: 200px;
  margin: 30px auto 60px auto;
  padding: 12px 25px;
  background-color: #0077b6; /* navy blue */
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: bold;
}
</style>
